detail_desc: All-in-one suit in soft velour with a kangaroo pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1½-4Y). The cotton content of the all-in-one suit is organic.

Round shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a zip at the top and a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle. One outer compartment. Lined. Diameter approx. 19 cm.
Small bag in braided paper straw with a decorative fabric pompom, narrow shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 8.5x12.5x15 cm.
Small bag in braided paper straw with a decorative fabric pompom, narrow shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 8.5x12.5x15 cm.

Small backpack in imitation leather with adjustable shoulder straps, an imitation suede flap with a decorative metal ring and concealed magnetic fastener, and press-studs at the sides. Lined. Size 11x19x19 cm.
Jacket in cotton denim with frayed details. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and discreet side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a cut-off hem.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with embroidery on one back pocket. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, wrapover jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, wrapover jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Block-patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Block-patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Block-patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Block-patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, back pockets and stripes down the sides of the legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and tapered legs with printed side panels.
Dungarees in soft, washed denim with worn details, adjustable straps and press-studs at the sides. Chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets, a fake fly and gently tapered legs.
Dungarees in soft, washed denim with worn details, adjustable straps and press-studs at the sides. Chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets, a fake fly and gently tapered legs.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets with decorative, gathered frills, back pockets and elasticated hems.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets with decorative, gathered frills, back pockets and elasticated hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with worn details in a looser fit with a jersey panel at the waist for optimum comfort, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with worn details in a looser fit with a jersey panel at the waist for optimum comfort, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Long-sleeved dress in lace made from a soft cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and a zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a grosgrain bow and a gently flared skirt. Jersey-lined bodice and skirt.

Long-sleeved dress in lace made from a soft cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and a zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a grosgrain bow and a gently flared skirt. Jersey-lined bodice and skirt.
Shorts in soft, gently draping Tencel™ lyocell denim with a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and fake back pockets. Soft jersey panel at the waist for optimum fit.
Chino shorts in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with low ribbing at the waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Chino shorts in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with low ribbing at the waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Chino shorts in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with low ribbing at the waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and buttoned cuffs.

Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Contrasting colour trims down the sleeves, and ribbed cuffs. Unlined.

Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Contrasting colour trims down the sleeves, and ribbed cuffs. Unlined.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and decorative ties at the waist, a fake fly, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and decorative ties at the waist, a fake fly, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Pull-on trousers in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Pull-on trousers in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Twill coat in a viscose blend with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole, buttons down the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Welt side pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Car coat in a water-repellent weave with a slight sheen. Funnel collar, a concealed zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and long sleeves. Welt side pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.
Longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.
Fine-knit dress with sequined embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Fine-knit dress with sequined embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Bolero in a soft fine knit containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.
Bolero in a soft fine knit containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.
Bolero in a soft fine knit containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.

Pea coat in woven fabric containing some wool with a collar, decorative shoulder tabs and loose yoke at the back. Detachable belt with a plastic fastener at the waist, an adjustable tab at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Satin blouse with a boat neck, yoke with decorative gathers at the back, and long sleeves with a button and small frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shirt in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Knee-length, fitted dress in sequin-embroidered lace with a round neckline and open section at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a scalloped edge at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Tulle skirt with a gathered elasticated waist. Lined.
Scarf in soft faux fur that can be fastened at the front. Satin lining. Size 18x130 cm.
Short skirt in imitation leather with decorative seams, a zip at the back and a raw-edge hem.
Top in jersey made from a cotton blend with decorative stitching, a round neck and short sleeves with a small frill trim.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and an opening with ties at the top. Gathered yoke at the top, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with decorative gathers front and back. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and an opening with ties at the top. Gathered yoke at the top, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with decorative gathers front and back. Unlined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details and sparkly stones. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved dress with a lace bodice and V-neck. Opening with a zip at the back and a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and a short chiffon skirt. Partly lined.
Short skirt in a soft, checked weave containing some wool with a zip fly, side pockets and one back pocket with a button. Lined.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and tapered legs with creases.
Microfibre thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Microfibre thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Short skirt in imitation leather with rows of fringing, a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with rows of fringing and a high waist with a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline, wide 3/4-length sleeves and short slits at the sides.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and concealed zip at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves and buttoned cuffs with broderie anglaise. Unlined.

Long dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt under the bust, and a high slit in one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tunic in an airy weave with a round neckline, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist and buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved tunic in a cotton weave with plastic beads at the top and a low stand-up collar with a frill and concealed buttons at the front. Tie belt under the bust and a rounded hem.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with smocked sections, a V-neck with flounces at the top and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Blouse in a patterned, crinkled weave with a lined stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Unlined.

Blouse in a jacquard weave made from a cupro blend with a frilled stand-up collar that has concealed buttons at the back. Long puff sleeves, frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs and a concealed zip at the back.

Blouse in a jacquard weave made from a cupro blend with a frilled stand-up collar that has concealed buttons at the back. Long puff sleeves, frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs and a concealed zip at the back.
